overview:
“Bethany Mayer is Senior Vice President of Worldwide Marketing at Blue Coat. Her responsibilities encompass marketing communications, demand creation, analyst and press relations, product strategy, and product and channel marketing.

Ms. Mayer brings over 20 years of experience in leading product management, marketing communications, engineering, and operations in both early stage start-up companies and Fortune 500 corporations. Prior to joining Bluecoat, Ms. Mayer served as CMO with Mirapoint Inc in the email and email security market . Ms. Mayer has held executive marketing positions at JDSU in optical components, Vernier Networks in the security space and Skystream Networks (now Ericsson) in the video and CDN space. Prior to that, she served in the Office of the CTO for Cisco Systems, developing the company’s technology vision. Over her seven year tenure with Cisco, Ms. Mayer led marketing and product management efforts for products tailored for the consumer, small business and dial access environment, in addition to developing the company’s early supply chain management strategy. Early in Ms. Mayerâ€™s career, she managed new product development for Apple Computers’ PowerBook laptop product line. Ms. Mayer started her career in operations within special projects at Lockheed Martin Corporation.

Ms. Mayer holds a Bachelor of Science degree from Santa Clara University. Ms. Mayer is a board member of Hospice of the Valley, a non-profit hospice organization.” (Source: Blue Coat Systems)
